methods.name: getManyAsObservable
methods.description: Fetch an array of documents via a GET request

jsdoctags.comment: the observable which will serve the array of requested documents

methods.name: getManyAsPromise
methods.description: Fetch an array of documents via a GET request

jsdoctags.comment: the promise which once fullfilled will serve the array of requested documents

methods.name: getOneAsObservable
methods.description: Fetch one document via a GET request

jsdoctags.comment: the observable which will serve the requested document

methods.name: getOneAsPromise
methods.description: Fetch one document via a GET request

jsdoctags.comment: the promise which once fullfilled will serve the requested document
